p: Wild type adult male zebrafish (12 months old) were kept under a 14/10 h light/dark cycle according to standard zebrafish breeding and maintenance protocol [ 76]. The fish were and fed three times a day with brine shrimp. All animal experiments were performed in accordance with the NIH guide for the care and use of Laboratory Animals (No.8023, revised in 1996), and this work was approved by the Animal Care and Use Committee of the Korea Research Institute of Chemical Technology.
